divs: Sighting Detailsi received a call from my dad on jan.18,2009 at around 9:00 pm because of an object in the sky over anaheim ca. with the naked eye it looked like a bright light but when viewed through a camera close up the object appeared to be broken up into little pieces. i have never seen anything like this before. the object did not appear to be moving. we were able to record around 10 mins of footage and then lost sight of it. it was not a blimp,plane,helicopter,or planet.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Stanton
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright circular object broken up into little pieces.
